column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Angela - Thank you for your great review. To accommodate our customer base
column3: 000 seasoned eggs every day. So if you ever receive a seasoned egg with your meal that is not flavorful enough
column4: please let us know and we'll provide you another. Hopefully it's not our recipe that you find lacking. Thank you again
column5: and we hope to serve you again soon.
